name: styles-cdn
description: A lightweight, modular CSS library served via high-performance CDN.

scripts.release:patch: npm run build && git add -A dist package.json && npm version patch -m "chore(release): v%s" && git push && git push --tags && npm run purge:cdn
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && git add -A dist package.json && npm version minor -m "chore(release): v%s" && git push && git push --tags && npm run purge:cdn
scripts.release:major: npm run build && git add -A dist package.json && npm version major -m "chore(release): v%s" && git push && git push --tags && npm run purge:cdn
